title: Greatness
comment: I love it when I get to find open source apps that provide quality and add free entertainment.

title: What can I say? I have really enjoyed it!
comment: It's simple with absolutely no problem encountered for the 3 years I've used it. For me it's relaxing.   Plus I can save my favorites. :)

title: Lovely
comment: This is the first kaleidoscope I've found that does 3D. Small and simple app. Very nice.

title: Career builder
comment: It is easy to build mind

title: App is very unstable.
comment: When it's working, it's great. I really like the 3D feature. The problem is the app shuts down when I hit Save, and at lots of other random times. The only remedy is to uninstall/reinstall. Please fix, then I'll give it more stars.
I do!

title: Wow! Beautiful and unbelievably versatile.
comment: Should have save option (take picture) on screen. Going to options and selecting save inevitably moves the phone and obscures the exact image you would like to get

title: Awsome

title: Fabulous App!
comment: The graphics are fantastic.  You get beautiful sharp images that will take your breath away.  Like an actual kaleidoscope, you can manipulate the picture to endless gorgeous images.  To top it off, you can save your creations!   I had some trouble initially with saving the pic so I emailed the provided address. I was amazed when I got an immediate response and solution.  Thank you!

title: Excellent
comment: Very versatile what can do - choice of number of mirrors and compression of jpeg
